hero.title: Streamline your Cisco network.
hero.subtitle: Take command of your network with the cisco.pm platform, tailored for simplicity and effectiveness.
hero.globe_title: Deploy a large scale network in minutes

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: All the tools you need
features.description: Astro is a high-performance static site builder that seamlessly integrates with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. It allows you to build websites with ease and speed, without sacrificing on performance.
features.configurationgeneration: Automate the tedious process of Cisco device configuration. Simply input your network requirements, and let our platform generate optimized configurations.
features.worktogether: Teams can work together on the same project - share your session, and track changes in real-time.
features.sdnconnector: Become your own Software-Defined Networking (SDN) orchestrator by simply installing a plugin that makes it possible to push new configurations directly from within the cisco.pm platform
features.Validation and Testing: Ensure configuration accuracy and compliance with built-in validation and testing features. Identify and rectify errors before deployment, minimizing downtime and operational risks.
features.Version Control: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.
features.Collaboration Support: Facilitate teamwork and collaboration among network administrators with built-in collaboration features. Share configurations, collaborate on projects, and track changes collaboratively within our platform
features.Feedback Mechanism: We value your feedback! Share your suggestions and feature requests with us, and help shape the future development of our webapp. Your input matters to us
features.decapcms: Open source content management for your Git workflow
features.articlegenerator: Use AI to generate your articles posts
